Bobson Lin 2019-12-13 Made with WebSlides OUTLINE Previous Review Parsing Files [JSON] Connect to API Connect to API - Dcard Connect to API - Zhihu Previous Review Fetch Data and Save Files urlretrieve('https://www.w3.org/TR/PNG/iso_8859-1.txt', './hello.txt') Reading and Writing Files with open('./hello.txt', 'w') as fd: fd.write('Hello World 123') Parsing Files - CSV with open('./sample.csv') as csvfile: rows = csv.reader(csvfile) Parsing Files - XML with open('./sample.xml', encoding='utf-8') as fd: doc = dict(xmltodict.
